title: Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail: News
body: News       Ft. McHenry National Historic Shrine and Monument makes every attempt to inform the public about events, projects, news, and accomplishments along the Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail and at partner sites along the trail. News releases distributed to the media as well as general announcements can be found in the News Releases section and in the archives. For press inquiries, please contact us at 410-962-4290. Subscribe to our monthly newsletter. Learn the latest from the Maryland War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission.
